/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to illuminate the scene as dusk falls. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery providing a stark contrast to the blue sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
